attributes.action: To allow all mothers the freedom to breast feed in public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After hearing about the idea to make breast feeding illegal I wish to make this petition to make it clear that as Mother we have the right to breast feed our children where and when needed ... BREAST IS BEST and it should be encouraged more ..Having it made illegal could stop all mothers thinking against breastfeeding and our children will suffer because of someone's dislike to the most natural thing on this planet and thats what womens breast are for not for men to ogle at ......
